name: Soul Temple starring Fork Knight
description:
Made in 3 days for the Mini-Jam 30.
Theme was "GameBoy" and limitation was "Have more than one playable character".

Take control of Fork Knight, a brave little hero who unfortunately lost his body after falling into a trap. Control the enemies patrolling the zone and use their various abilities to make your way to your body!

Thanks a lot to Ditoval, who made the music and SFX for the game!
